response.original_title: 新世紀エヴァンゲリオン劇場版 Air／まごころを、君に
response.overview: SEELE orders an all-out attack on NERV, aiming to destroy the Evas before Gendo can advance his own plans for the Human Instrumentality Project. Shinji is pushed to the limits of his sanity as he is forced to decide the fate of humanity. An alternate ending to the television series "Neon Genesis Evangelion", which aired from 1995 to 1996 and whose final two episodes were controversial for their atypically abstract direction.
response.tagline: The fate of destruction is also the joy of rebirth.
response.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
